basics.name: Erin Howland
basics.label: Data Geek
basics.summary: Detail-oriented individual, uniquely educated and experienced in business at the nexus of finance, accounting, and data science/analytics. Exceptionally fast learner, adaptable, and decisive. Straightforward, honest, and articulate communicator. Passionate about scalable, modular, data-driven systems and processes that move the business forward.

work.name: Strategic America
work.summary: Utilize Tableau to design dashboards (reports) for a variety of clients; create and document process improvements for the Data, Research, and Insights team, including the use of Python, Power Query Power Automate, and PowerShell to help automate tasks; recommend tools to help improve our work and/or to decrease cost
highlights: Used Python to export PDF versions of Tableau dashboards from Tableau Online (client wanted PDFs), used Power Automate to help collegue decrease time spent on task from a little over an hour per month to less than two minutes per month, use Power Query to automate data cleaning

work.name: Casey's
work.summary: Analyze IT procurement policies and procedures; develop templates and strategies to improve effectiveness of financial reporting of the IT department; partner with procurement, accounting, and finance to develop better interdepartmental understanding of the relationship between procurement processes using Coupa, IT needs and experiences, and the financial reporting outcomes; utlize interdepartmental partnerships to fine tune processes, policies, and procedures and to coordingate in-house learning sessions; create data sets and reporting to measure progress and effectiveness of strategies; utilize microstrategy and Power BI for data analysis and vizualization
highlights: Created budget template for IT department and linked to Power Query to analyze YOY changes and find instances where we may have duplicated efforts across cost centers

work.name: Iowa Farm Bureau
work.summary: In charge of all aspects of accounting for nine companies within the Farm Bureau umbrella, including AP, AR, financial reporting, and payroll; state and Federal PAC reporting; fleet tracking and analysis; account analysis
highlights: Automated working papers (Excel), including those for invesetment analysis

work.name: Bergan KDV
work.summary: Assist in-charge in various assurance services; write reports and create financial statement for clients using Asset Keeper and ProSystems Engagement; tax return preparation for individuals and businesses, and informational returns using CCH Axcess/ProSystems fx Tax; Assist with other projects as needed, including preparation for litigation support and business valuations
highlights: Automated audit working papers (Excel), Audit, Tax

volunteer.summary: support and mentor kids at various stages of coding capabilities
volunteer.highlights: Developed and co-taught a course on Python for Data Visualization during Tech Journey's Tech Camp (summer 2023)

courses: Courses included (non-exhaustive): Statistics for Data Science, Data Exploration and Analysis, Data Mining, Predictive Analysis, Data Exploration and Analysis, Data Preparation, Big Data, Applied Data Science

skills.name: Data Analysis/Data Science Languages and Tools
